tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE AdHocReports (
 report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 report_title STRING,
 report_content STRING,
 report_date DATE,
 generated_by_user STRING
)

CREATE TABLE report_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT NOT NULL,
    metric_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    metric_value DECIMAL(10,2),
    metric_date DATE,
    CONSTRAINT fk_report_id FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES ad_hoc_reports(report_id)
);

CREATE TABLE report_users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT NOT NULL,
    user_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    user_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_report_id FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES ad_hoc_reports(report_id)
);

CREATE TABLE AdHocReports (
	report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	report_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	creation_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
	report_content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ReportAuthors (
	author_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	author_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	author_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE ReportStatistics (
	stat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	report_id INT NOT NULL,
	views INT,
	downloads INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES AdHocReports(report_id)
)

CREATE TABLE ReportComments (
	comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	report_id INT NOT NULL,
	comment_text TEXT,
	comment_date DATE,
	FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES AdHocReports(report_id)
)

CREATE TABLE ReportCategories (
	category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	category_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)
